text:
Using Features "Off-Label" with Python, primarily in the "Pants" build system. I don't have much experience with it, the underlying engine is built in Rust, with the language for building in Python.

* type annotations
** Depedency injection by types
* asyncio
** Coroutines helping avoid side effects, remote execution
* dataclasses
** cacheabiity
*** frozen dataclasses to make types cacheable
title: CreatingExtensibleWorkflows2021
caption: Creating extensible workflows with off-label use of Python
